issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

iPod (4.1) with mobile sdk build 1.4.2.e6bd67

1.Phone>camera>Video Record
2.toggle to front camera and view output in console
results:

Mon Sep 27 11:46:58 unknown KitchenSink[84] : MP _playbackInterruptionDidEndNotification :: NSConcreteNotification 0x7eea650 {name = AVController_PlaybackInterruptionDidEndNotification; object = <AVController: 0xd124850>; userInfo = {

    "AVController_InterruptionStatusNotificationParameter" = "non-resumable.PlayAndRecord";
    "AVController_InterruptorNameNotificationParameter" = RecorderServer;
}}, _state = 0

same in 1.4.0

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: unexpected output in video test case when toggling to front view camera

comments.body: Latest KitchenSink doesn't seem to have a 'video record' option inside the camera menu. Tested on a Samsung Galaxy S2 using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120821095711, unable to reproduce the issue. Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as we no longer support this version of Kitchen Sink.
